commits.body: 2.0 can return surrounding punctation as the word input when there is no preexisting color, workaround this by replacing the input only if it is a valid color.
commits.summary: Changes due to the way 2.0 returns word input
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Remove non-functional completion commands
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.body:
Taken from SCSS bundle: https://github.com/MarioRicalde/SCSS.tmbundle/blob/ed7b0310682603a856a646a2db2dbcf3787cedb0/Syntaxes/SCSS.tmLanguage#L1570

There is a comment in the SCSS bundle “Reversal order is important; KEEP IT” – so I kept it :-)

However, I removed the “…|[0-9]{1,3}\%|…” part from the regex, because I think it doesn't belong here (it matches percent values, not property names).
commits.summary: Grammar: Match CSS 3 property names and vendor prefixes
commits.author: Stefan Daschek

commits.summary: Update bundle maintainer info
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Move color picker changes into UI library in bundle support
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Switch to tm_dialog for documentation lookup query
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.summary: Correct documentation links for Text Decoration Module
commits.author: Michael Sheets

commits.body: Unfortunately there is no "official" compound index of all CSS3 properties. There are several unoffical indexes, the updated list of properties in the bundle is generated from http://meiert.com/en/indices/css-properties/ (provided by Jens Meiert; seems fairly complete and up-to-date).
commits.summary: "Documentation for Property" now works for (most) CSS3 properties.
commits.author: Stefan Daschek

commits.body:
Using abort will show an error dialog in TextMate 2.

Closes textmate/textmate#900.
commits.summary: Don’t abort when user cancels “Documentation for Property”
commits.author: Allan Odgaard
